snippet: The new electric vehicle is “the final step in the master plan, which is a mass market, affordable car,” said Tesla’s chief executive, Elon Musk.
lead_paragraph: The new electric vehicle is “the final step in the master plan, which is a mass market, affordable car,” said Tesla’s chief executive, Elon Musk.

headline.main: Tesla Model 3 Orders Surge Even Before Its Unveiling
headline.print_headline: Tesla Orders Surge Even Before Unveiling of New Electric Car, Model 3
